mapper.select: select count(*) from hdg_unregister_battery where qrcode = #{qrcode}
select count(*) from hdg_unregister_battery where code = #{code}
select * from hdg_unregister_battery where code = #{code} and shell_code = #{shellCode}
select count(*) from hdg_unregister_battery where shell_code = #{shellCode}

select count(*) from hdg_unregister_battery
and id LIKE concat(#{id}, '%')
and DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) = DATE_FORMAT( #{createTime}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and code LIKE concat(#{code}, '%')
and shell_code LIKE concat(#{shellCode}, '%')
and cell_mfr LIKE concat(#{cellMfr}, '%')
and cell_model LIKE concat(,#{cellModel}, '%')
and id in ( select battery_id from hdg_battery_cell where battery_id is not null and battery_id !='' and barcode LIKE concat(#{cellBarcode}, '%') )

select * from hdg_unregister_battery
and id LIKE concat(#{id}, '%')
and DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) = DATE_FORMAT( #{createTime}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and code LIKE concat(#{code}, '%')
and shell_code LIKE concat(#{shellCode}, '%')
and cell_mfr LIKE concat(#{cellMfr}, '%')
and cell_model LIKE concat(#{cellModel}, '%')
and id in ( select battery_id from hdg_battery_cell where battery_id is not null and battery_id !='' and barcode LIKE concat(#{cellBarcode}, '%') )
order by create_time desc limit ${beginIndex}, ${rows}
mapper.insert: insert into hdg_unregister_battery( id, code, shell_code, qrcode, volume, use_count, cell_count, is_online, battery_type, create_time ) values( #{id}, #{code}, #{shellCode}, #{qrcode}, #{volume}, #{useCount}, #{cellCount}, #{isOnline}, #{batteryType}, #{createTime} )
